name: WP Font Manager
author: Mighty Plugins

sections.description: Managing google font is never been easier. Previously you need to put google font by editing functions.php. But now you can add add fonts and subsets visually. Themes and plugins developer can easily integrate with there theme and plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire wp-font-manager folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find ‘WP Font Manager’ page at admin sidebar. Search font and add them to your site. After adding font you need to add font family to your css file or at ‘Additional CSS’ in customize panel.

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the entire wp-font-manager folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find ‘WP Font Manager’ page at admin sidebar. Search font and add them to your site. After adding font you need to add font family to your css file or at ‘Additional CSS’ in customize panel.
